info.title: Account Management
info.description: This is Swagger UI environment generated for the TMF Account Management specification

get.description: This operation list or find PartyAccount entities

parameters.name: jwt
parameters.description: authorization java web token to be provided in header

X-Result-Count.description: Actual number of items returned in the response body

X-Total-Count.description: Total number of items matching criteria

get.description: This operation retrieves a PartyAccount entity. Attribute selection is enabled for all first level attributes.

parameters.name: jwt
parameters.description: authorization java web token to be provided in header

patch.description: This operation updates partially a PartyAccount entity.

get.description: This operation list or find BillingAccount entities

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Party Account id to be provided in request

parameters.name: jwt
parameters.description: authorization java web token to be provided in header

X-Result-Count.description: Actual number of items returned in the response body

X-Total-Count.description: Total number of items matching criteria

get.description: This operation retrieves a BillingAccount entity. Attribute selection is enabled for all first level attributes.

parameters.name: jwt
parameters.description: authorization java web token to be provided in header

patch.description: This operation updates partially a BillingAccount entity.

parameters.name: jwt
parameters.description: authorization java web token to be provided in header

parameters.name: billingAccount
parameters.description: The Billing account to be updated

Account.description: Generic Account structure used to define commonalities between sub concepts of PartyAccount and Financial Account.

accountType.description: A categorization of an account, such as individual, joint, and so forth, whose instances share some of the same characteristics. Note: for flexibility we use a String here but an implementation may use an enumeration with a limited list of valid values.

description.description: Detailed description of the party account

lastModified.description: Date of last modification of the account

state.description: Contains the lifecycle state such as: Active, Closed, Suspended and so on.

creditLimit.description: The maximum amount of money that may be charged on an account

balanceType.description: Type of the balance : deposit balance, disputed balance, loyalty balance, receivable balance...

AccountRef.description: Account reference. A account may be a party account or a financial account.

description.description: Detailed description of the account

AccountRelationship.description: Significant connection between accounts. For instance an aggregating account for a list of shop branches each having its own billing account.

AccountTaxExemption.description: Proof of freedom from taxes imposed by a taxing jurisdiction

certificateNumber.description: Identifier of a document that shows proof of exemption from taxes for the taxing jurisdiction

issuingJurisdiction.description: Name of the taxing jurisdiction for which taxes are exempt

validFor.description: Period for which the exemption is valid

BillFormat.description: A detailed description of the way in which a bill is presented.

id.description: Unique identifier of the bill format

description.description: An explanatory text for this bill format

BillFormat_Create.description:
A detailed description of the way in which a bill is presented.
Skipped properties: id,href

description.description: An explanatory text for this bill format

BillFormat_Update.description:
A detailed description of the way in which a bill is presented.
Skipped properties: id,href

description.description: An explanatory text for this bill format

BillFormatRef.description: BillFormat reference. A bill format is a description of the way in which a bill is presented.

id.description: Unique identifier of the bill format

BillFormatRefOrValue.description: An attachment by value or by reference.

id.description: Unique identifier of the bill format

description.description: An explanatory text for this bill format

BillPresentationMedia.description: A mean of communicating a bill, supported by the associated bill format. For example, post mail, email, web page.

id.description: Unique identifier of the bill presentation media

href.description: Reference of the bill presentation media

description.description: An explanatory text describing this bill presentation media

BillPresentationMedia_Create.description:
A mean of communicating a bill, supported by the associated bill format. For example, post mail, email, web page.
Skipped properties: id,href

description.description: An explanatory text describing this bill presentation media

BillPresentationMedia_Update.description:
A mean of communicating a bill, supported by the associated bill format. For example, post mail, email, web page.
Skipped properties: id,href

description.description: An explanatory text describing this bill presentation media

BillPresentationMediaRef.description: PresentationMedia reference. A mean of communicating a bill, supported by the associated bill format. For example, post mail, email, web page.

id.description: Unique identifier of the bill presentation media

href.description: Reference of the bill presentation media

BillPresentationMediaRefOrValue.description: An attachment by value or by reference.

id.description: Unique identifier of the bill presentation media

href.description: Reference of the bill presentation media

description.description: An explanatory text describing this bill presentation media

BillStructure.description: The structure of the bill for party accounts (billing or settlement).

BillingAccount.description: A party account used for billing purposes. It includes a description of the bill structure (frequency, presentation media, format and so on). It is a specialization of entity PartyAccount.

accountType.description: A categorization of an account, such as individual, joint, and so forth, whose instances share some of the same characteristics. Note: for flexibility we use a String here but an implementation may use an enumeration with a limited list of valid values.

description.description: Detailed description of the party account

lastModified.description: Date of last modification of the account

paymentStatus.description: The condition of the account, such as due, paid, in arrears.

state.description: Contains the lifecycle state such as: Active, Closed, Suspended and so on.

BillingAccount_Create.description:
A party account used for billing purposes. It includes a description of the bill structure (frequency, presentation media, format and so on). It is a specialization of entity PartyAccount.
Skipped properties: id,href

accountType.description: A categorization of an account, such as individual, joint, and so forth, whose instances share some of the same characteristics. Note: for flexibility we use a String here but an implementation may use an enumeration with a limited list of valid values.

description.description: Detailed description of the party account

lastModified.description: Date of last modification of the account

paymentStatus.description: The condition of the account, such as due, paid, in arrears.

state.description: Contains the lifecycle state such as: Active, Closed, Suspended and so on.

creditLimit.description: The maximum amount of money that may be charged on an account

BillingAccount_Update.description:
A party account used for billing purposes. It includes a description of the bill structure (frequency, presentation media, format and so on). It is a specialization of entity PartyAccount.
Skipped properties: id,href,accountBalance

accountType.description: A categorization of an account, such as individual, joint, and so forth, whose instances share some of the same characteristics. Note: for flexibility we use a String here but an implementation may use an enumeration with a limited list of valid values.

description.description: Detailed description of the party account

lastModified.description: Date of last modification of the account

paymentStatus.description: The condition of the account, such as due, paid, in arrears.

state.description: Contains the lifecycle state such as: Active, Closed, Suspended and so on.

creditLimit.description: The maximum amount of money that may be charged on an account

BillingCycleSpecification.description: A detailed description of when to initiate a billing cycle and the various sub steps of a billing cycle.

id.description: Unique identifier of the billing cycle specification

href.description: Reference of the billing cycle specification

billingDateShift.description: An offset of a billing/settlement date. The offset is expressed as number of days with regard to the start of the billing/settlement period.

billingPeriod.description: A billing time period. It can be recurring, for example: week, month, quarter of year, year .

chargeDateOffset.description: An offset of a date through which charges previously received by the billing system will appear on the bill. The offset is expressed as number of days with regard to the start of the BillingPeriod.

creditDateOffset.description: An offset of a date through which credits previously received by the billing system will appear on the bill. The offset is expressed as number of days with regard to the start of the BillingPeriod.

description.description: An explanation regarding this billing cycle specification

frequency.description: Frequency of the billing cycle (monthly for instance)

mailingDateOffset.description: An offset of a customer bill mailing date. The offset is expressed as number of days with regard to the start of the BillingPeriod.

paymentDueDateOffset.description: An offset of a payment due date. The offset is expressed as number of days with regard to the start of the BillingPeriod.

validFor.description: The period for which the billing specification cycle is valid

Contact.description: An individual or an organization used as a contact point for a given account and accessed via some contact medium.

contactName.description: A displayable name for that contact

partyRoleType.description: Identifies what kind of party role type is linked to the contact (a account manager...)

ContactMedium.description: Indicates the contact medium that could be used to contact the party.

mediumType.description: Type of the contact medium, such as: email address, telephone number, postal address

preferred.description: If true, indicates that is the preferred contact medium

characteristic.description: Any additional characteristic(s) of this contact medium

validFor.description: The time period that the contact medium is valid for

EntityRef.description: Entity reference schema to be use for all entityRef class.

id.description: Unique identifier of a related entity.

FinancialAccount.description: An account of money owed by a party to another entity in exchange for goods or services that have been delivered or used. A financial (account receivable account/account payable) aggregates the amounts of one or more party accounts (billing or settlement) owned by a given party. It is a specialization of entity Account.

accountType.description: A categorization of an account, such as individual, joint, and so forth, whose instances share some of the same characteristics. Note: for flexibility we use a String here but an implementation may use an enumeration with a limited list of valid values.

description.description: Detailed description of the party account

lastModified.description: Date of last modification of the account

state.description: Contains the lifecycle state such as: Active, Closed, Suspended and so on.

creditLimit.description: The maximum amount of money that may be charged on an account

FinancialAccount_Create.description:
An account of money owed by a party to another entity in exchange for goods or services that have been delivered or used. A financial (account receivable account/account payable) aggregates the amounts of one or more party accounts (billing or settlement) owned by a given party. It is a specialization of entity Account.
Skipped properties: id,href

accountType.description: A categorization of an account, such as individual, joint, and so forth, whose instances share some of the same characteristics. Note: for flexibility we use a String here but an implementation may use an enumeration with a limited list of valid values.

description.description: Detailed description of the party account

lastModified.description: Date of last modification of the account

state.description: Contains the lifecycle state such as: Active, Closed, Suspended and so on.

creditLimit.description: The maximum amount of money that may be charged on an account

FinancialAccount_Update.description:
An account of money owed by a party to another entity in exchange for goods or services that have been delivered or used. A financial (account receivable account/account payable) aggregates the amounts of one or more party accounts (billing or settlement) owned by a given party. It is a specialization of entity Account.
Skipped properties: id,href,lastModified

accountType.description: A categorization of an account, such as individual, joint, and so forth, whose instances share some of the same characteristics. Note: for flexibility we use a String here but an implementation may use an enumeration with a limited list of valid values.

description.description: Detailed description of the party account

state.description: Contains the lifecycle state such as: Active, Closed, Suspended and so on.

creditLimit.description: The maximum amount of money that may be charged on an account

FinancialAccountRef.description: AccountReceivable reference. An account of money owed by a party to another entity in exchange for goods or services that have been delivered or used. An account receivable aggregates the amounts of one or more party accounts (billing or settlement) owned by a given party.

MediumCharacteristic.description: Describes the contact medium characteristics that could be used to contact a party (an individual or an organization)

contactType.description: The type of contact, for example: phone number such as mobile, fixed home, fixed office. postal address such as shipping instalation

emailAddress.description: Full email address in standard format

faxNumber.description: The fax number of the contact

phoneNumber.description: The primary phone number of the contact

socialNetworkId.description: Identifier as a member of a social network

Money.description: A base / value business entity used to represent money

unit.description: Currency (ISO4217 norm uses 3 letters to define the currency)

PartyAccount.description: Account used for billing or for settlement purposes concerning a given party (an organization or an individual). It is a specialization of entity Account.

accountType.description: A categorization of an account, such as individual, joint, and so forth, whose instances share some of the same characteristics. Note: for flexibility we use a String here but an implementation may use an enumeration with a limited list of valid values.

description.description: Detailed description of the party account

lastModified.description: Date of last modification of the account

paymentStatus.description: The condition of the account, such as due, paid, in arrears.

state.description: Contains the lifecycle state such as: Active, Closed, Suspended and so on.

PartyAccount_Create.description:

PaymentMethodRef.description: PaymentMethod reference. A payment method defines a specific mean of payment (e.g direct debit).

id.description: Unique identifier of the payment mean

PaymentPlan.description: Defines a plan for payment (when a party wants to spread his payments)

numberOfPayments.description: Number of payments used to spread the global payment

paymentFrequency.description: Frequency of the payments, such as monthly and bimonthly

status.description: Status of the payment plan (effective, ineffective)

validFor.description: Validity period of the payment plan

RelatedParty.description: Related Entity reference. A related party defines party or party role linked to a specific entity.

id.description: Unique identifier of a related entity.

role.description: Role played by the related party

creditLimit.description: The maximum amount of money that may be charged on an account

TimePeriod.description: A period of time, either as a deadline (endDateTime only) a startDateTime only, or both

endDateTime.description: End of the time period, using IETC-RFC-3339 format

startDateTime.description: Start of the time period, using IETC-RFC-3339 format. If you define a start, you must also define an end

EventSubscription.description: Sets the communication endpoint address the service instance must use to deliver notification information

EventSubscriptionInput.description: Sets the communication endpoint address the service instance must use to deliver notification information

Error.description: Used when an API throws an Error, typically with a HTTP error response-code (3xx, 4xx, 5xx)

code.description: Application relevant detail, defined in the API or a common list.

reason.description: Explanation of the reason for the error which can be shown to a client user.

message.description: More details and corrective actions related to the error which can be shown to a client user.

referenceError.description: URI of documentation describing the error.

BillingAccountExtended.description: A party account used for billing purposes. It includes a description of the bill structure (frequency, presentation media, format and so on). It is a specialization of entity PartyAccount.

product.description: The products associated with the Billing Account

ProductRefOrValue.description: A product to be created defined by value or existing defined by reference. The polymorphic attributes @type, @schemaLocation & @referredType are related to the product entity and not the RelatedProductRefOrValue class itself

description.description: Is the description of the product. It could be copied from the description of the Product Offering.

isBundle.description: If true, the product is a ProductBundle which is an instantiation of a BundledProductOffering. If false, the product is a ProductComponent which is an instantiation of a SimpleProductOffering.

isCustomerVisible.description: If true, the product is visible by the customer.

name.description: Name of the product. It could be the same as the name of the product offering

orderDate.description: Is the date when the product was ordered

productSerialNumber.description: Is the serial number for the product. This is typically applicable to tangible products e.g. Broadband Router.

startDate.description: Is the date from which the product starts

terminationDate.description: Is the date when the product was terminated

status.description: Is the lifecycle status of the product.

ProductSpecificationRef.description: Product specification reference: A ProductSpecification is a detailed description of a tangible or intangible object made available externally in the form of a ProductOffering to customers or other parties playing a party role.

targetProductSchema.description: A target product schema reference. The reference object to the schema and type of target product which is described by product specification.

ProductStatusType.description: Possible values for the status of the product

Characteristic.description: Describes a given characteristic of an object or entity through a name/value pair.

valueType.description: Data type of the value of the characteristic

CharacteristicRelationship.description: Another Characteristic that is related to the current Characteristic;

TargetProductSchema.description: The reference object to the schema and type of target product which is described by product specification

description.description: Detailed description of the financial plan

id.description: Unique identifier of the financial plan

ServiceRef.description: Service reference, for when Service is used by other entities
